loginText: Enter your email below to login to your account
signupText: Enter your information to create an account
emailVerifyText: Enter the verification code sent to the e-mail address {mail}. Do not refresh this page.
purposeText: What is the target audience and purpose of the project?
howToUseText: View detailed usage of the project.
personalInformationText: View or update your personal information
projectAnnouncementsText: View project postings and apply to the ones that suit you.
myProjectAnnouncementsText: View your projects or add a new project
deleteMessage: It is being deleted, are you sure?
findTeammatesForYourTeamDescription: Find people suitable for your team in the industry you want and start working immediately.
whatPosition: What position are you looking for?
searchJobText: Enter the job or ad id you are looking for
title: Title
jobDescriptionText: Describe the job you want to work on and let users know why they should apply for that job.
requirementsText: Enter the competencies and requirements you are looking for
socialLinksText: Add social network links you use
changePasswordText: Enter your old password and new password
updatePersonalInfo: You can update your personal information here.
cvDropzoneText: Choose a pdf file for your resume.
profilePhotoDropzoneText: Choose a file of type image for your profile photo.
projectGlobalDescription: Find your project teammate now! Share your skills, meet suitable team members, and complete your projects successfully. Sign up for quick and easy connections!
projectGlobalKeywords: Finding Team Members,Project Collaboration,Remote Work Opportunities,Project Management,Job Listings,Team Building,Entrepreneur Support,Networking Opportunities,Work Environment,Creative Projects,Career Opportunities,Online Job Platform

validation.maxCharacters: {0} must be at most {1} characters long

TurnOnEmailNotificationsDescription: If you turn on email notifications, you can receive news about new postings.
TurnOnJobPostingNotificationsDescription: If you turn on job posting notifications, you can receive notifications of those who apply to your postings.
noOneHasSharedAnythingYet: No one has shared anything yet
noCompetenciesText: No competencies have been added yet.
noBiographyText: No biography information has been added yet.
noJobText: Occupation information has not been entered yet.
noReferenceText: No one has applied for this posting yet.
githubSupportMessage: This project is open source. We are waiting for your support.
alreadyUserText: A user already exists with this email.
newCodeText: The new code has been sent to your e-mail address.
criticalAlertText: The project is under development. Please do not enter critical information. Complete security is not ensured.
